text: Tadera rasulagana balechilena, ‘allah sambandhe ki kono sandeha ache, yini asamanasamuha o yaminera srstikarta [1]? Tini tomaderake dakachena tomadera papa ksama karara jan'ya ebam nirdista kala paryanta tomaderake abakasa deyara jan'ya. Tara balala, tomara to amadera'i mata manusa. Amadera pitrpurusagana yadera ‘ibadata karata tomara tadera ‘ibadata hate amaderake birata rakhate ca'o [2]. Ata'eba tomara amadera kache kono akatya pramana [3] upasthita kara
